insert.foreach: INSERT INTO report (id, date, businessName, businessPID, businessAddress, province, city, area, expandTime, empName, empAlipayAccount, isResignation, priceCoefficient, tranNum, passedTranNum, shamTranNum, activeClientNum, settledClientNum, monthSettleClientNum, remSettleClientNum, marketType, marketName, leadsSources) VALUES (#{item.id}, #{item.date}, #{item.businessName}, #{item.businessPID}, #{item.businessAddress}, #{item.province}, #{item.city}, #{item.area}, #{item.expandTime}, #{item.empName}, #{item.empAlipayAccount}, #{item.isResignation}, #{item.priceCoefficient}, #{item.tranNum}, #{item.passedTranNum}, #{item.shamTranNum}, #{item.activeClientNum}, #{item.settledClientNum}, #{item.monthSettleClientNum}, #{item.remSettleClientNum}, #{item.marketType}, #{item.marketName}, #{item.leadsSources})
